Hi mike,yes I was just looking at the others and wondering how they could all look the same, as in age, quality ect without being modern. These would easily fool a new collector I feel, They look to be fairly well made at first glance, probably second glance as well.

cheers

Rich

  Rich, 

  Modern.  The seller has seven similar sukashi tsuba listed at the same price:

  http://user.auctions.yahoo.co.jp/jp/show/auctions?userID=hiraku36&apg=4&f=&o
